entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023
